title: Classic Star Wars: The Rebel Storm
description: There is no peace for the crew of the Millennium Falcon between Star Wars and The Empire Strikes Back. Follow their adventures as they plunge head first into an underwater hunt that leads to a demonsquid, a treasonous and plotting Kraaken, the ferocious night beast, lost power gems, stranded Calamarians, and giant sea worms. Full-color throughout. Graphic novel format.
author: Archie Goodwin
